name: Full Stack Engineer
description:
The platform SHAREKEY is rapidly growing and we are looking for a Full Stack Engineer to join our successful team.

Position Summary

We are looking for a proactive individual who will be a part of our product development team. The one who will be responsible for designing and shipping new features, collaborating with teammates in key decisions around product and engineering needs. You will be part of the Development team working on our Web and Electron Apps. You will be involved in all stages of the Agile development process, in close collaboration with our PM, QA, and Design Team.

Duties and Responsibilities

  • Analyze requirements and collaborate with team members to produce thoughtful software designs.
  • Provide accurate estimates on work items.
  • Build client-side applications using JS/TS, ReactJS, other frameworks.
  • Analyze software issues, find their root cause, and fix them.
  • Participate in code reviews and quality control activities.

Requirements

  • 1.5+ years of experience with JS/TS.
  • Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles.
  • Strong knowledge of ES6+, HTML5, CSS3, CSS preprocessors.
  • Experience with at least one state management tool such as Redux, MobX, Flux, React Context.
  • Understanding of common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack,
  • Knowledge of server technologies and backend principles.
  • Familiarity with Node.js and any of its framework.
  • Knowledge of Git is mandatory.
  • Knowledge of algorithms and data structures.
  • NPM, etc.
  • Experience with Databases e.g. MongoDb, Redis.
  • Experience in Cryptology, security software is a plus.
  • Familiarity with electron is a plus
  • Familiarity with Docker is a plus.
  • Team player with a dedication to code review, unit testing, and other quality-oriented practices.
  • Intermediate English level (written and spoken).
  • Good communication skills.

Benefits

  • Opportunity to work on-site and remotely, Minsk-based.
  • Competitive salary and package.
  • Paid holidays & flexible paid time off.
  • Incentive based on results.
  • Free snacks, fruits, espresso coffee, tea and soft drinks.
  • On-site restaurants & cafés.
  • Modern & comfortable place to work, located in the heart of Internatsionalnaya. Best location in town!

Our office is located in the most central and vibrant part of the city. Few companies in Minsk provide such modern and comfortable working conditions. We have designed our new office as a living and bright Swiss style inspired loft. Our Team has access to great facilities and the most inspiring office space in the city.​​​​
